metadata.title: CVE-2017-2661 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ClusterLabs pcs before version 0.9.157 is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting vulnerability due to improper validation of Node name field when creating new cluster or adding existing cluster.

criterions.comment: pcs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.164-1').
